step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to bring them down a bit more as you roll them back. Keep focusing on that circular motion.
Great job on the circular motion! Your shoulders are moving smoothly. Remember to keep the movement gentle and controlled.
You're completing the rolls nicely. Try to keep your wrists and elbows more relaxed and let the movement originate from your shoulders.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow.
